SQL_STMT_U.val: select PCTAOP.OP, PCTAOP.Talao, PCORPROD.Cd_material from PCORPROD INNER JOIN PCTAOP ON PCTAOP.OP = PCORPROD.OP where PCORPROD.Liberacao = (select liberacao from PCORPROD where op = :1)
select Codigo_Material,Versao,cd_Material_Vinculado,Tipo from Arquivo..LC_MATERIAL_ARQUIVO where Codigo_Material = ':1' and convert(int,right(rtrim(tipo),'1')) = :2

ExpSyntax.val: Trim({1,8}) & ' ' & '"'&Translate('%CIGAM_INSTAL%')&'Temp\3' & Translate('%USUARIO%') & Trim(Str({1,4},'11')) & Trim(Str({1,5},'11')) & '.pdf" "' & RepStr(TranslateNR('%TempDir%')& 'Gerado ' & Trim({0,20}),'.rtf','.pdf') & '"'

Translate('%CIGAM_INSTAL%') & 'CGReport.exe -G: -M:"w:\cigame10\Systempar\OP_Calbos.frx" -A:"'&Translate('%CIGAM_INSTAL%')&'Temp\3' & Translate('%USUARIO%') & Trim(Str({1,4},'11')) & Trim(Str({1,5},'11')) & '.frx" -F:PDF="'&Translate('%CIGAM_INSTAL%')&'Temp\3' & Translate('%USUARIO%') & Trim(Str({1,4},'11')) & Trim(Str({1,5},'11')) & '.pdf" -P:@op_inicial="'&Trim(Str({1,4},'11'))&'" -P:@talao_final="'&Trim(Str({1,5},'11'))&'" -P:@talao_inicial="'&Trim(Str({1,5},'11'))&'" -P:@op_final="'&Trim(Str({1,4},'11'))&'" -P:@liberacao=""'
